content: this is my christmas / holiday season gift for the knitters in 2024 >this pattern is available also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option --- **pattern features ** - yardage approx 20-30 grams of colour 1 pale brown lucky omen yarns merinosukka in swan song colourway and 50-70 grams of colour 2 gingerbread brown satuko design merino sock yarn - knitted cuff down - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions compatible with dpns magic loop and other techniques - five sizes extra-small 60 sts small 64 sts medium 68 sts large 72 sts and extra-large 76 sts - advanced technique to hide the jog at the bor in the latvian braid - slipped-stitch heel flap and round heel turn - charts but no written instructions for stranded colourwork - pattern proof-read by helena kahan 1 https //payhip com/b/jzojv
